{{Infobox Berry |name = #05 Aspear |image = [[File:Aspear.png]] |caption = This Berry's peel is hard, but the flesh inside is very juicy. It is distinguished by its bracing sourness. |growtime = 2m |harvest = 6 berries |replant = 50% |points = 9 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *10 sour }} '''Aspear''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]] to obtain [[Farming Points|Farm Points]]. It can be obtained as a random drop by defeating wild Pokémon on routes. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 10 secs || 40 secs || 1 min || 2 mins - 4 mins |- ! Animation |
